GSP31tsc_bhau:3: puruṣaḥ sa jayatyādyaḥ sā ca prakṛtirīśvarī /
GSP31tsc_bhau:10: yebhyo vivektavyo yaśca vivecanīyaḥ tadubhayaṃ sūtratrayeṇoddiśati |
GSP31tsc_bhau:18: tathā prakṛtiparyāyā avyaktaṃ pradhānaṃ brahma akṣaraṃ kṣetraṃ tamaḥ māyā brāhmī vidyā avidyā prakṛtiḥ śaktiḥ ajā ityādayaḥ |
GSP31tsc_bhau:19: sattvādiguṇavatī sattvādyatiriktā prakṛtiriti tu na śaṅkanīyam |
GSP31tsc_bhau:21: sattvādīnāmataddharmatvaṃ tadrūpatvāditi sāṃkhyapravacanasūtreṇa sattvādīnāṃ prakṛtisvarūpatvahetunā prakṛtidharmatvapratiṣedhāt |
GSP31tsc_bhau:22: prakṛterguṇa ityādivākyaṃ tu vanasya vṛkṣā itivad boddhavyam |
GSP31tsc_bhau:23: “sattvaṃ rajastama iti prakṛterabhavan guṇā” iti prakṛtikāryatvavacanaṃ tu
GSP31tsc_bhau:25: mahadādisṛṣṭirhi guṇavaiṣamyācchrūyate tacca vaiṣamyaṃ sajātīyasaṃvalanena prakāśādiphalopahitaḥ sattvādivyavahārayogyaḥ kāraṇaguṇānāṃ pariṇāma iti |
GSP31tsc_bhau:27: sattvāditrayaṃ aha dravyatve 'pi puruṣopakaraṇatvād guṇā ityucyante |
GSP31tsc_bhau:31: tāni ca sattvādīni pratyekaṃ saṃkhyāvyaktikāni laghutvādidharmairanyonyaṃ sādharmyaṃ vaidharmyaṃ ca guṇānāmiti sāṃkhyapravacanasūtrāt |
GSP31tsc_bhau:32: atra hi sūtraṃ laghutvādinā bahūnāṃ sattvānāṃ sādharmyaṃ tenaiva rajastamobhyāṃ vaidharmyam
GSP31tsc_bhau:33: evaṃ ca laghutvādinā bahūnāṃ rajasāṃ gurutvādinā bahūnāṃ tamasāṃ sādharmyavaidharmye ukte iti |
GSP31tsc_bhau:34: teṣu tritvavacanaṃ tu sattvatvādivibhājakopādhitrayeṇaiva vaiśeṣikāṇāṃ navadravyavacanavaditi
GSP31tsc_bhau:40: sa ca virudhyata iti cet maivam gandhasya pṛthivīvyāpakatvavatprakṛtervyāpakatvam |
GSP31tsc_bhau:45: prakṛtyanumānaṃ cetthaṃ mahadādikāryaṃ pakṣaḥ sukhaduḥkhamohātmakadravyakāryamiti sādhyaṃ kāryatve sati sukhaduḥkhamohātmakatvāditi hetuḥ vastrādikāryaśayyāsanavaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ |
GSP31tsc_bhau:47_0: nanu sukhasyāntarevānubhavāt śayyāsanādau sukhe kiṃ pramāṇaṃ yena dṛṣṭāntatā syāditi cenna kāraṇaguṇā hi kāryaguṇānārabhante
GSP31tsc_bhau:47_1: iti nyāyena viṣayeṣu triguṇakāryeṣu sukhaduḥkhamohasiddheḥ ghaṭarūpamiti pratyayavat candanasukhaṃ strīsukhamityādisukhapratyayādapi
GSP31tsc_bhau:47_2: viṣaye sukhādyucitaṃ sukhaduḥkhotpādakatvācca tadgatameva sukhaduḥkhādikaṃ sidhyati antaḥkaraṇasukhādihetutayā 'pi viṣaye
GSP31tsc_bhau:48: kālādibhedairekasyā eva tryādivyakteḥ sukhaduḥkhotpādakatvācca tadgatameva sukhaduḥkhādikaṃ siddhyati ||
GSP31tsc_bhau:55: mano matirmahān brahmā pūrvaṃ buddhirvṛttiḥ khyātiḥ prajñā santatiḥ smṛtiriti |
GSP31tsc_bhau:58: buddhiḥ prajñopalabdhiśca tathā brahmā vṛttiḥ smṛtiḥ //
GSP31tsc_bhau:61: sarvataḥ śrutimāṃlloke sarvaṃ vyāpya sa tiṣṭhati /
GSP31tsc_bhau:65: idameva mahattattvamaṃśato rajastamaḥsambhedena pariṇataṃ sat vyaṣṭijīvānāmupādhiradharmādiyutaṃ kṣudramapi bhavati |
GSP31tsc_bhau:69: idameva mahattattvaṃ kāryeśvarasya svayambhuva upādhistenaivopādhinā sa sarvajñaḥ sarveśvaraḥ sarvakarttā sarvapālakaḥ sarvasaṃharttā ca |
GSP31tsc_bhau:75: sa ca svayambhūḥ kriyāśaktimat kevalamahattattvopādhikaḥ sūtrātmetyucyate
GSP31tsc_bhau:77: samagrasuṣuptau tu samagralayena nirviśeṣacinmātrasvarūpeṇāvasthānādīśvara ityucyate śrutismṛtipurāṇeṣu mahāṃstridhā taduktaṃ vaiṣṇave |
GSP31tsc_bhau:82: jñānena mokṣaḥ vairāgyeṇa prakṛtilayaḥ puruṣatattvānabhijñasya vairāgyāt prakṛtilayo bhavati
GSP31tsc_bhau:84: prakṛticintakānadhikṛtya “pūrṇaṃ śatasahasraṃ tu tiṣṭhanti vigatajvarā” iti |
GSP31tsc_bhau:87: tatra vairāgyapūrvakaṃ teṣu teṣvātmabhāvenopāsyamāneṣu layo hi prakṛtāviti ca śrūyate |
GSP31tsc_bhau:91: bauddhā daśa sahasrāṇi tiṣṭhanti vigatajvarāḥ // iti ca /
GSP31tsc_bhau:92: ayaṃ ca prākṛtiko bandha ityucyate yogibhiḥ mahadādibhāvaśca vaikṛtiko bandha iti |
GSP31tsc_bhau:102: ahaṅkāro 'bhimānaśca karttā mantā ca sa smṛtaḥ /
GSP31tsc_bhau:103: ātmā ca prakulo jīvo yataḥ sarvāḥ pravṛttayaḥ // iti /
GSP31tsc_bhau:121: tāni ca pañca śabdatanmātraṃ sparśatanmātraṃ rūpatanmātraṃ rasatanmātraṃ gandhatanmātraṃ ceti
GSP31tsc_bhau:122: śāntaghoramūḍhāḥ pañcasvapi viśeṣāḥ śabdatvasparśatvādivyāpyā jātiviśeṣā eva |
GSP31tsc_bhau:127: rase madhuratvādayo viśeṣāste ca madhuratiktakaṣāyakaṭvamlakṣārāḥ ṣaḍrasāḥ
GSP31tsc_bhau:130: teṣāṃ paryāyāḥ tanmātrāṇi tamovigrahāḥ sūkṣmavigrahāḥ sūkṣmabhūtāni aviśeṣā iti //
GSP31tsc_bhau:135: ekādaśendriyāṇi pañcamahābhūtāni ca ete ṣoḍaśa vikārāḥ |
GSP31tsc_bhau:138: tatra uccāraṇaṃ vācaḥ hastayorādānaṃ pādayorgatiḥ pāyorutsargaḥ upasthasyānandaḥ |
GSP31tsc_bhau:143: atha paryāyāḥ indriyāṇi karaṇāni nipātanāni vaikārikāṇi taijasāni |
GSP31tsc_bhau:157: bhūtāni vikārā viśeṣā ākṛtayaḥ tamovigrahāḥ śāntā ghorā mūḍhā iti |
GSP31tsc_bhau:161: anādiḥ sūkṣmaścetanaḥ sarvagataḥ nirguṇaḥ kūṭastho nityo draṣṭā bhoktā kṣetravit amanaḥ prasavadharmā ceti svarūpam |
GSP31tsc_bhau:165: atha paryāyāḥ puruṣa ātmā pumān pudgalajantuḥ jīvaḥ kṣetrajñaḥ naraḥ kaviḥ brahma akṣaraḥ prāṇaḥ jñaḥ yaḥ kaḥ sa eka iti |
GSP31tsc_bhau:169: jaṭī muṇḍī śikhī vā 'pi mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ //
GSP31tsc_bhau:170: sa ca puruṣo nānā sukhaduḥkhamohajanmamaraṇabandhamokṣavyavasthātaḥ janmādivyavasthātaḥ puruṣabahutvamiti sāṃkhyapravacanasūtrāt |
GSP31tsc_bhau:171: yadyekaḥ puruṣaḥ syādekasmin sukhite sarve sukhitāḥ syuḥ evaṃ sarvatra evaṃ puruṣabahutvaṃ siddham |
GSP31tsc_bhau:172: evaṃ tāvat sāṃkhyācāryāḥ kapilāsuripañcaśikhapatañjaliprabhṛtayo yasmāt paraṃ nāparamasti kiñciditi nyāyavaiśeṣikāśca bahūn puruṣānātmatvena vadanti |
GSP31tsc_bhau:177: tadakṣaraṃ tadvibhurvareṇyaṃ yasmāt paraṃ nāparamasti kiñcit sa hi sarveṣu bhūteṣu sthāvareṣu careṣu ca vasatyeko mahānātmā yena sarvamidaṃ tatam |
GSP31tsc_bhau:180: ekameva yathā sūtraṃ suvarṇe varttate punaḥ /
GSP31tsc_bhau:185: sāṃkhyāstu ādipuruṣaviṣayatayā layāvaśiṣṭanirviśeṣacinmātraviṣayatayā vā etāni śrutivākyāni yojayanti |
GSP31tsc_bhau:190: ṣoḍaśakastu vikāro na prakṛtirna vikṛtiḥ puruṣaḥ // iti /
GSP31tsc_bhau:192: guṇānāmavāntaravibhāgaṃ taddharmāṃśca vivecayituṃ vakṣyamāṇasañcarapratisañcaropodghātasaṅgatyā ca sūtraṃ pravarttate |
GSP31tsc_bhau:195: sattvarajastamāṃsi trayo guṇāḥ teṣāṃ samāhārastriguṇaṃ triguṇameva traiguṇyam |
GSP31tsc_bhau:204: idānīṃ saguṇanirguṇaśrutiviṣayopapattyarthaṃ sargādāvutpannaṃ svayambhuvaṃ pralayāvaśiṣṭanirviśeṣacitsāmānyaṃ ca darśayituṃ sṛṣṭipralayayoḥ sūtradvayaṃ pravartate |
GSP31tsc_bhau:211_0: sargādau svayameva kṣubdhā satī bhāvinārāyaṇabījabhūtā pūrvakalpe svayambhūpālakena nāmakena vyaktena nārāyaṇapuruṣeṇa saṃyujyate
GSP31tsc_bhau:211_1: tataśca sajātīyairanyaiḥ prakṛtyaṃśairnyūnādhikabhāvena militā satī cetanācetanātmakaṃ mahattattvamārabhate |
GSP31tsc_bhau:212_0: nanu puruṣasya prakṛtisaṃyogitve asaṃyogo hyayaṃ puruṣa iti śrutivirodha iti cenna vikārahetusaṃyogasyaiva saṅgaśabdārthatvāt
GSP31tsc_bhau:212_1: anyathā śrutismṛtiṣu jalasaṃyogino 'pi padmapattrasyāsaṅgatādṛṣṭāntatā na syāt |
GSP31tsc_bhau:213: tatra mahattattvasya svarūpeṇa mukhyotpattiḥ cetanasya tu abhivyaktirūpā kāryatā |
GSP31tsc_bhau:222: tataḥ parisphuratyādau sarge tailaṃ tilādiva // iti /
GSP31tsc_bhau:226: vyaktāṃ karoti nityāṃ tāṃ prakṛtiṃ paramaḥ pumān // iti /
GSP31tsc_bhau:230: saiva prakṛtyadhiṣṭhātrī devatā mahālakṣmī ambā bhavānī haimavatī durgā ityādipadairabhilapyate purāṇādiṣu |
GSP31tsc_bhau:231: saiva ca līlāvigrahairādipuruṣeṇa militā satī sṛṣṭiṃ pālayati |
GSP31tsc_bhau:233: śivaḥ śaktyā yukto yadi bhavati śaktaḥ prabhavituṃ na cedevaṃ devo na khalu kuśalaḥ spanditumapi iti /
GSP31tsc_bhau:237: etasmānmahato guṇāntarasaṃvalitāt trividho 'haṅkāra utpadyate cetanācetanātmakaḥ vaikāriko rājasastāmasaśceti |
GSP31tsc_bhau:238: tataścāhaṅkārāt saṅkalpapūrvakaṃ dehendriyāṇi pañca tanmātrāṇi cotpadyante
GSP31tsc_bhau:239: svayabhuva indriyāṇi devatārūpāṇi vaikārikāt vyaṣṭīndriyāṇi ca taijasāt teṣvindriyeṣvādau mana utpadyate |
GSP31tsc_bhau:245: tanmātreṣu tvasti sa yathā ahaṃkārācchabdatanmātraṃ tasmādahaṃkārotpannācchabdatanmātrādahaṃkārasahitāt sparśatanmātraṃ śabdasparśobhayaguṇakam |
GSP31tsc_bhau:248: tatrāhaṅkārāt pañcatanmātrāṇāṃ taddvārā pañcamahābhūtānāṃ cotpattau purāṇe krama uktaḥ sa yathā bhūtādistu vikurvāṇaḥ śabdamātraṃ sasarja hi /
GSP31tsc_bhau:251: vāyurutpadyate tasmāt tasya sparśo guṇo mataḥ //
GSP31tsc_bhau:255: teṣu pañcamahābhūtāni varjjayitvā 'haṃkāraṃ ca buddhau praveśya
GSP31tsc_bhau:258: tacca sarvapuruṣāṇāṃ svasvabījabhūtaprakṛtisaṃyogāt sargādāvutpadya prākṛtapralayaparyantaṃ tiṣṭhati |
GSP31tsc_bhau:260: prāṇaśca buddhereva vṛttibheda ityato liṅaśarīre pṛthak na nirdiśyate buddhāvevāntarbhāvāt
GSP31tsc_bhau:261: tasya ca liṅgaśarīrasya paramasūkṣmāṇi pañca mahābhūtāni tejaḥpradhānānyāśrayaḥ citrādivat āśrayaṃ vinā lokāntaragamanāsambhavāt |
GSP31tsc_bhau:263: citraṃ yathāśrayamṛte sthāṇvādibhyo vinā yathā chāyā /
GSP31tsc_bhau:264_0: tadvadvinā viśeṣairna tiṣṭhati nirāśrayaṃ liṅgam // iti idaṃ ca liṅgaśarīramādau svayambhuvaḥ samaṣṭicetanasya upādhibhūtamekameva
GSP31tsc_bhau:264_1: samaṣṭirūpaṃ jāyate tataśca vyaṣṭijīvānāmapyupādhibhūtāni vyaṣṭiliṅgaśarīrāṇi tadaṃśabhūtāni tato vibhajyante piturliṅgaśarīrāt
GSP31tsc_bhau:271: svayambhūḥ svaliṅgaśarīrāvayavān sūkṣmānalpān ātmamātrāsu svāṃśacetaneṣu saṃyojya sarvaprāṇinaḥ sasarjeti |
GSP31tsc_bhau:275: vyomnyapi vāyuḥ vāyāvapi tejaḥ tejasi daśaguṇe jalaṃ tathaiva jalasyāpi daśaguṇasya madhye pṛthvī samutpadyate saiva sthūlaśarīrasya bījamaṇḍarūpeṇa pariṇamate |
GSP31tsc_bhau:276: tasyāpi daśaguṇitasyāṇḍasya pṛthivyāvaraṇasya madhye caturdaśabhuvanātmakaṃ svayambhuvaḥ sthūlaśarīraṃ tatsaṅkalpādevotpadyate |
GSP31tsc_bhau:283: sa vai śarīrī prathamaḥ sa vai puruṣa ucyate /
GSP31tsc_bhau:285: āpo nārā iti proktā āpo vai narasūnavaḥ /
GSP31tsc_bhau:286: tā yadasyāyanaṃ pūrvaṃ tena nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ //
GSP31tsc_bhau:288: tata evādipuruṣādvyaṣṭipuruṣāṇāṃ vibhāgāt ante ca tatraiva layāt sa evaika ātmeti śrutismṛtyorvyavahriyate
GSP31tsc_bhau:289: tataśca sa nārāyaṇo virāṭśarīrī pṛthivīrūpasvanābhikamalakarṇikāsthānīyasya sumerorupari caturmukhamavāntarabrahmāṇaṃ sṛṣṭvā taddvārānyānapi vyaṣṭiśarīriṇaḥ sthāvarāntān sasarja |
GSP31tsc_bhau:295: dainandinapralayeṣveva hi nārāyaṇaśarīre praviśyaikībhūya suptānāṃ devānāṃ caturmukhādikrameṇāvirbhāvaḥ śeṣaśāyinaḥ sakāśād ghaṭate na tvādisargeṣu |
GSP31tsc_bhau:297: asyāṃ sṛṣṭau mahattattvasya buddhipūrvakaḥ triguṇātmakaḥ prathamaḥ sargaḥ
GSP31tsc_bhau:305: taduktaṃ sa īśo yadvaśe māyā sa jīvo yastayārdita iti |
GSP31tsc_bhau:312: ete ca sṛṣṭisthitisaṃhārarūpāḥ sthūlā eva pariṇāmāḥ kūṭasthapuruṣavivekāya pradarśitāḥ |
GSP31tsc_bhau:314: yathā nityadāhyaṅgabhūtāni bhavanti na bhavanti ca /
GSP31tsc_bhau:316: ata eva sarvaṃ jaḍavastu paramārthataḥ sarvadaiva asaducyate |
GSP31tsc_bhau:322: tadeva sadeva saumyedamagra āsīt ekamevādvitīyaṃ brahmetyādiśrutiṣu sadbrahmādipadavācyam
GSP31tsc_bhau:324: idānīmantakālīnabhagavatsmaraṇasya paramagatihetutvaśravaṇāt tatsmaraṇasya ca sādhyātmasādhibhūtasādhidaivabhagavadanucintanajanyatvādadhyātmādivibhāgaḥ pradarśyate sūtratrayeṇa |
GSP31tsc_bhau:327: yaḥ prayāti sa madbhāvaṃ yāti nāstyatra saṃśayaḥ // iti sādhibhūtādhidaivaṃ māṃ sādhiyajñaṃ ca ye viduḥ /
GSP31tsc_bhau:328: prayāṇakāle 'pi ca māṃ te viduryuktacetasaḥ // iti /
GSP31tsc_bhau:374: devatāmadhikṛtya vartata ityadhidaivatam karaṇābhimānidevatāvargaḥ etatsahiteśvarānucintitasyāntakālīnabhagavatsmṛtyā paramagatiḥ phalam |
GSP31tsc_bhau:377: tattvāni yo vedayate yathāvad guṇasvarūpāṇyadhidaivataṃ ca /
GSP31tsc_bhau:378: vimuktapāpmā gatadoṣasaṅgho guṇāṃstu bhuṅkte na guṇaiḥ sa bhujyate //
GSP31tsc_bhau:380_1: pañcaviṃśatijātayaḥ dharmadharmyabhedāt vyaktayo 'pi tattvānītyucyante vedayate vettītyarthaḥ |
GSP31tsc_bhau:381: guṇāḥ sattvarajastamāṃsi tānyeva svarūpāṇi tāttvikarūpāṇi yeṣāṃ tāni guṇasvarūpāṇi adhidaivatañca adhyātmādhibhūtayorupalakṣaṇam |
GSP31tsc_bhau:383: na guṇaiḥ sa bhujyate guṇavaśo na bhavatītyarthaḥ ||
GSP31tsc_bhau:386_0: tatra pañcasroto 'mbuṃ pañcayonyugracakrāṃ pañcaprāṇormiṃ pañcabuddhyādimūlām pañcāvarttāṃ pañcaduḥkhaughavegāṃ pañcāśadbhedāṃ
GSP31tsc_bhau:389: tatrābhibuddhirnāma abhimukhī buddhiḥ idamavaśyaṃ karaṇīyamitirūpā buddhivṛttiḥ /
GSP31tsc_bhau:396: karmajanyāḥ karmajanakāśca dhṛtiḥ śraddhā sukhā 'vividiṣā vividiṣā ceti pañca ||
GSP31tsc_bhau:400: dānaṃ pratigraho homaḥ śraddhāyā lakṣaṇaṃ smṛtam //
GSP31tsc_bhau:405: ekatvaṃ ca pṛthaktvaṃ ca nityaṃ cedamacetanam /
GSP31tsc_bhau:406: sūkṣmaṃ satkāryamakṣobhyaṃ jñeyā vividiṣā hi sā //
GSP31tsc_bhau:412: ete pañca kriyāśaktimadantaḥkaraṇavṛttibhedā api vāyusamānagatikatvādvāyudevatākatvācca vāyava ityuktam |
GSP31tsc_bhau:421: vaikārikastaijaso bhūtādiḥ sānumāno niranumānaśceti karmātmānaḥ karmiṇa ityarthaḥ |
GSP31tsc_bhau:428: idānīṃ pañcāśadbhedāṃ pañcaparvāmadhīma iti śrutyarthopapattaye buddheḥ pañcāśatsargān bahubhiḥ sūtrairuddiśati |
GSP31tsc_bhau:431: sā ca pañcadhā avidyāsmitārāgadveṣābhiniveśāḥ kleśajanakatvāt kleśā iti yoge paribhāṣitāḥ
GSP31tsc_bhau:433: asmitā anātmanyahaṃvṛttiḥ avidyāsmitayorayaṃ bhedaḥ avidyāyāmadhikaraṇamapi pṛthag bhāsate 'smitāyāṃ tvāroparūpatve 'pi
GSP31tsc_bhau:438: viduṣāmapi svarasavāhī anādimaraṇaduḥkhānubhavajanitavāsanājanyaḥ śrutismṛtipurāṇeṣu ete avidyābhedāstamaādiśabdaiḥ paribhāṣitāḥ |
GSP31tsc_bhau:441: te ca viṣayabhedāt dviṣaṣṭibhedāḥ te yathā |
GSP31tsc_bhau:443: devā aṇimādyaṣṭavidhamaiśvaryamāsādya vayamamṛtā ityabhimānino bhavanti so
GSP31tsc_bhau:445: dṛṣṭānuśravikeṣu dvādaśasu viṣayeṣu prāpteṣu mukto 'hamiti manyate so 'bhimāno rāgātiśayanimittatvāt mahāmoho daśavidhaḥ |
GSP31tsc_bhau:446: aṇimādyaṣṭaguṇaiśvarye daśavidhaviṣaye ca pratihatasya krodhād yadduḥkhamutpadyate sa tāmisro 'ṣṭādaśavidhaḥ |
GSP31tsc_bhau:447: devā aṇimādyaṣṭakamaiśvaryaṃ śabdādīṃśca daśa viṣayān bhuñjānāḥ kṣayaśaṅkayā 'tra santi satāsa evāṣṭādaśavidho 'ndhatāmiśra iti dviṣaṣṭibhedā pañcaparvā avidyā ||
GSP31tsc_bhau:471: yathā nānātmajño mukta iti śrutvā viparītaṃ pratipanno nānātmajño 'hamamukta iti |
GSP31tsc_bhau:477: svadānamanarthakaṃ jñātvā dānapātrasya guruṇi duḥkhe jāte pramodaḥ pramuditā |
GSP31tsc_bhau:484: kutaścit sarvākāreṇa pariṇamamānā prakṛtireva jñānaṃ kariṣyatīti śrutvā yā tuṣṭiḥ sā prakṛtyākhyā tasyā asteti saṃjñā |
GSP31tsc_bhau:485: pravrajyayaiva jñānaṃ bhaviṣyatīti śrutvā pravrajyopādānena yā tuṣṭiḥ sā salilasaṃjñā |
GSP31tsc_bhau:486: kālenaiva jñānaṃ bhaviṣyatīti śrutvā pravrajyayā bahukālena yā tuṣṭiḥ sā ādyetyucyate |
GSP31tsc_bhau:487: bhāgyenaiva jñānaṃ bhaviṣyati madālasā bālakānāmiveti kutaścicchrutvā yā tuṣṭiḥ sā vṛṣṭiritisaṃjñā
GSP31tsc_bhau:489_0: atha bāhyāḥ pañca śabdādiviṣayeṣvarjanarakṣaṇakṣayabhogahiṃsādidoṣadarśanādyā nivṛttituṣṭayastāsvekā tuṣṭiḥ apāramucyate
GSP31tsc_bhau:489_1: dvitīyā supāraṃ tṛtīyā pāram anuttamāmbhasikā caturthī uttamāmbhaḥ pañcamī iti nava tuṣṭayo vyākhyātāḥ ||
GSP31tsc_bhau:495: bhagavatkṛpāvaśādūhanena tarkeṇaiva jñānamutpadyate sā prathamā siddhistāretyucyate |
GSP31tsc_bhau:496: śabdaśravaṇamātrādeva yad jñānaṃ sā dvitīyā sutārā |
GSP31tsc_bhau:497: śiṣyabhāvenādhyayanena yad jñānaṃ sā tṛtīyā tāratāreti |
GSP31tsc_bhau:501: yat suhṛtsaṃsargitayā jñānaṃ sā saptamī ramyaketi |
GSP31tsc_bhau:503: āsu prathamāstisro duḥkhavighātātmakānāṃ mukhyānāṃ tisḥṇāṃ siddhīnāmaṅkuśa ākarṣakaḥ sādhaka iti yāvat siddhayastvetā eva |
GSP31tsc_bhau:506: idānīṃ sāṃkhyaśāstrasya ṣaṣṭitantratvapratipādanāya pañcāśatsu siddhisargeṣu daśānyān pūrayati sūtreṇa |
GSP31tsc_bhau:509: yogo viyogo bahavaḥ pumāṃsaḥ sthitiḥ śarīrasya ca śeṣavṛttiḥ //
GSP31tsc_bhau:511: tatrāstitvaṃ dvayordharmaḥ ekatvaṃ sargabhedena nānātvābhāvarūpaṃ prakṛteḥ
GSP31tsc_bhau:518: jīvanmuktasya saṃskāramātreṇa cakrabhramivaccharīrasya yā sthitiḥ sā śeṣavṛttiḥ puruṣasya
GSP31tsc_bhau:519: iti daśapadārthāḥ pratyayasargākhyāḥ pañcāśat pūrvoktāḥ ete ca daśa mūlikāḥ |
GSP31tsc_bhau:523: pañcatanmātrā anugṛhyopādānakāraṇatvena svīkṛtya yaḥ sargaḥ so
GSP31tsc_bhau:525: pañcānāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ sacaturmukhasanakādīnāṃ svasya līlāvigrahe sargo bhaktānamanugrahārthaṃ so 'pyanugrahasargaḥ pañcatanmātrebhya eva ||
GSP31tsc_bhau:543: prākṛtiko vaikṛtiko dākṣiṇa iti trayo bandhāḥ |
GSP31tsc_bhau:546: tṛtīyastu gṛhasthādīnāṃ kāmopahatacetasāṃ dakṣiṇāṃ dadatāṃ dakṣiṇābandhaḥ
GSP31tsc_bhau:548: prākṛtena tu bandhena tathā vaikārikeṇa ca /
GSP31tsc_bhau:549: dakṣiṇābhistṛtīyena baddho janturvivartate // iti mokṣatraividhyaṃ coktam |
GSP31tsc_bhau:550: ādau tu mokṣo jñānena dvitīyo rāgasaṃkṣayāt /
GSP31tsc_bhau:569: idaṃ tu jñānopadeṣṭurevāptalakṣaṇam vastuto yathābhūtārthasyopadeṣṭā puruṣa ityeva /|
GSP31tsc_bhau:571: ubhābhyāṃ yanna siddhaṃ tacchabdapramāṇena sidhyati yathendro devānāṃ rājā uttarāḥ kuravaḥ sauvarṇo meruḥ svarge 'psarasaḥ ete padārthā na
GSP31tsc_bhau:574: antaḥkaraṇasyendriyāṇāṃ cāvibhaktaḥ saṅkocavikāsaśālyagrabhāgo vṛttirabhyupeyate bhāgaguṇābhyāṃ tattvāntaraṃ vṛttiḥ sambandhārthaṃ sarpatīti sāṃkhyapravacanasūtrāt |
GSP31tsc_bhau:576_0: tathā cāntaḥkaraṇavṛttirindriyavṛttidvārārthasannikṛṣṭā bhavati tata indriyavṛttyā sahārthākārā pariṇamate sā cārthākārā
GSP31tsc_bhau:576_1: vṛttirguṇarūpā sarvātmanāṃ vibhutve 'pi svasvāminyevātmani pratibimbate nānyatra
GSP31tsc_bhau:578: pratibimbaścādhiṣṭhānagatāyā buddhervikāraḥ pariṇāmaḥ svattvaṃ ca svāmiprakāśitavṛttijanyasaṃskāravattvam
GSP31tsc_bhau:579_0: svāmitvaṃ ca svaniṣṭhasaṃskārajanakavṛttiprakāśakatvaṃ sā ca vṛttirātmani sthitā satī arthākārā ātmākārā ca svasamānākāraṃ
GSP31tsc_bhau:579_1: pariṇāmāntaraṃ dhatte sa evātmani vṛttipratibimbo viṣayatākhyaḥ sambandha iti tadavacchinnaṃ caitanyaṃ pratyakṣapramā ghaṭamahaṃ
GSP31tsc_bhau:583_0: iyaṃ ca pratyakṣā vṛttirviṣayadeśe jāyamānā tatraivātmani pratibimbate ātmano vibhutvāt yatra cendriyadvāraṃ vinā manaḥ svavāsanāvaśādyatrārthena
GSP31tsc_bhau:591: yathārthapadasmṛtijanyā padārthasaṃsargākārā vṛttiḥ śabdapramāṇam tatpratibimbāvacchinnacaitanyaṃ śābdī pramā idaṃ pramāṇadvayamāntarameva |
GSP31tsc_bhau:592: aparokṣatvaṃ parokṣatvaṃ smṛtitvaṃ saṃśayatvaṃ viparyayatvaṃ pramātvamapramātvaṃ ca sarve vṛttidharmā eva tatpratibimbavaśāccaitanye
GSP31tsc_bhau:595: yatra yannāsti tatra tanniścayo viparyayaḥ yathārthavṛttiḥ pramā ayathārthavṛtirapramā atra pramātrādivibhāgaviṣaye vijñānācāryāṇāṃ kārikā
GSP31tsc_bhau:596: pramātā cetanaḥ śuddhaḥ pramāṇaṃ vṛttireva ca /
GSP31tsc_bhau:601: jñānasya ca janyatvaṃ vināśitvamātmadharmatvaṃ ca pratibimbāvacchinnatvenopapādanīyam ātmarūpasya jñānasya nityatvāt |
GSP31tsc_bhau:602: viśiṣṭe hi vidhiniṣedhau viśeṣaṇamupasaṃkrāmataḥ sati viśeṣye bādha iti nyāyāt |
GSP31tsc_bhau:603: ādhārādheyabhāvo 'pi khe khagodaya itivadupapādanīyaḥ vṛttīnāmātmani pratibimbe pramāṇam |
GSP31tsc_bhau:608: atra śāstre 'nuktāḥ svāvirodhinaḥ śāstrāntarīyā api padārthāḥ grāhyāḥ sārādānaṃ ṣaṭpadavaditi sāṃkhyapravacanasūtrāt |
GSP31tsc_bhau:609: sarvataḥ sāramādadyāt puṣpebhya iva ṣaṭpada iti smṛteśca |
GSP31tsc_bhau:616: anena trividhaduḥkhenābhibhūtasya tarati śokamātmaviditi śrutvā ātmani jijñāsā jāyate |
GSP31tsc_bhau:619: [etatparaṃ yāthārthyaṃ etajjñātvā kṛtakṛtyaḥ syānna punastrividhaduḥkhenābhibhūyate || Tats_25
GSP31tsc_bhau:620_1: tu tatkathanena pūrṇaṃ śrutisammatatvācca paraṃ sarvotkṛṣṭamityarthaḥ |
GSP31tsc_bhau:621: śrutiśca gopālatāpanīye ekamevādvitīyaṃ brahmāsīt tasmādavyaktādavyaktamevākṣaraṃ tasmānmahanmahato
GSP31tsc_bhau:622: pañcatanmātrāṇi tebhyo bhūtāni iti spaṣṭameva sāṃkhyayogoktamahadādikrameṇa sṛṣṭiḥ śrūyata iti |
GSP31tsc_bhau:626: pūrvoktatrividhaduḥkhena na yujyate duḥkhātyantanivṛttirūpo mokṣo bhavatītyarthaḥ |
GSP31tsc_bhau:627: nanu duḥkhaṃ tāvat trividham anāgataṃ vartamānamatītaṃ ceti |
GSP31tsc_bhau:629: anāgato ghaṭo varttamāno ghaṭo 'tīto ghaṭa ityavasthātraye 'pi
GSP31tsc_bhau:632: na ca tatkāle kathamabhāvapratyaya iti vācyam varttamānapratiyogikasāmayikātyantābhāvenaiva tadupapatteriti |
GSP31tsc_bhau:633: evaṃ cānagatātītaduḥkhayorabhāve 'pi na puruṣārthaḥ bhogyaduḥkhābhāvasyaiva puruṣārthatvāt
GSP31tsc_bhau:634_0: vartamānaduḥkhaṃ ca bhogyamapi bhogenaiva naṅkṣyatīti tadabhāvo na puruṣārthaḥ puruṣaprayatnanirapekṣatvāt puruṣaprayatnasāpekṣasyaiva
GSP31tsc_bhau:634_1: puruṣārthatvāt tathā ca kathaṃ duḥkhābhāvasya bhogyahetutayā tadabhāvasya ca puruṣakṛtisādhyatayā puruṣārthatvaṃ duḥkhahetūcchede
GSP31tsc_bhau:635: heyaṃ duḥkhamanāgataṃ vivekakhyātiravitpravā hānopāya iti sūtradvayena /
GSP31tsc_bhau:636: sāṃkhyānāṃ ca sarvātmanāmavaidharmyābheda eva tattvamasivākyārtho nāvibhāgādiḥ tajjñānasyaivābhimānanivarttakatvāt
GSP31tsc_bhau:637: tadvākyasya ca śvetaketoranūcānatvādyabhimānanivṛttyarthameva pravṛtteḥ tathā ca layāvaśiṣṭacitsāmānyaṃ tatpadārthaḥ taduktaṃ vijñānācāryavaryairasmadgurubhirbhāṣyādyaślokena /
GSP31tsc_bhau:640: vaidharmyalakṣaṇabhidā virahaṃ vadanti nākhaṇḍatāṃ kha iva dharmaśatāvirodhāt // iti /
GSP31tsc_bhau:642: bhogāpavargasamāptyā cāntaḥkaraṇasya nāśenaiva trividhaduḥkhātyantanivṛttirūpo mokṣo bhavatīti paramakṛtakṛtyatā |
GSP31tsc_bhau:651: na naśyati tamo rāma kṛtayā dīpavārtayā // iti /
GSP31tsc_bhau:652: evamabhyāsāt komalakaṇṭakanyāyena jñāne jāte yogarūḍha ityucyate yogī asmāt pūrvastu yuñjānaḥ tataḥ paramahaṃsāśrameṇa vikṣepakāṇi karmāṇi tyaktvā jñānaniṣṭhāparyantamabhyaset |
GSP31tsc_bhau:654: tataḥ sa yukto jīvanmukto guṇātīta iti cocyate |
GSP31tsc_bhau:662: // iti anyaccātra sāṃkhyavidyāyāṃ bhagavadbhakterevāsādhāraṇakāraṇatvaṃ jñeyam anyathā devakṛtavighnairyogadhvaṃso bhavatyeva yathoktaṃ bhāgavate |
GSP31tsc_bhau:664: āruhya kṛcchreṇa paraṃ padaṃ tataḥ patantyadho 'nādṛtayuṣmadaṅdhrayaḥ
GSP31tsc_bhau:665: śreyaḥśrutiṃ bhaktimudasya te vibho kliśyanti ye kevalabodhalabdhaye
GSP31tsc_bhau:666: teṣāmasau kleśala eva śiṣyate nānyadyathā sthūlatuṣāvaghātinām // iti
GSP31tsc_bhau:667: idānīṃtanāḥ kecana vaiṣṇavā etādṛśavākyairbhagavadbhaktiṃ puraskṛtya sāmānyato jñānamārgaṃ khaṇḍayati te tu vidyāvivekānabhijñāḥ sthūlamataya eva |
GSP31tsc_bhau:671: citte hi svavaśe yogaḥ siddhyet tattu jagatpatim /
GSP31tsc_bhau:677: sa guṇān samatītyaiva brahmabhūyāya kalpyate // iti /
GSP31tsc_bhau:678: brahmabhūyāya pūrṇatvenābhivyaktaye guṇābhidhānaṃ tattadavacchinnatvenaivābhivyajyate tasmād bhagavadbhaktireva mukhyaṃ sādhanaṃ sāṃkhyayogavidyāyāmiti siddham |
GSP31tsc_bhau:680: tena me prīyatāṃ kṛṣṇaḥ paramātmā jagadguruḥ //
GSP31tsc_bhau:684: tebhyaṃ samarpitaṃ caitat tenāpi prīyatāṃ hariḥ //
